timeline.bodyText:
We added these  apis to CentralRepoAccount:

getAccountsWithIdentifierLike()
getAccountsWithIdentifier()

I think when looking for an account to create a persona, those are the ones we should use here.
Also it isn't obvious if the user is supposed to type in a substring or a full account identifier.  We are using the api getAccountsWithIdentifierLike().  What if that returns multiple hits  - does the user get to pick one?
timeline.author: raman-bt

timeline.message: 6397 Fixing account search in AddAccount dialog
